replies.body: Can't seem to find them in the store at the moment :/

Hi there,

Mystery Ward Skins were not set up in store correctly. We apologize for taking far too long to fix this. It should now be appearing in store and we've extended the sale to the 16th at 17:29PM AEST.
Are we able to send Mystery Ward Skins to our friends, or is that just another thing you've missed out?
Mystery wards are not able to be gifted, this was a change to the original announcement.
i was really wishing we could gift them {{champion:32}} {{item:3070}}  why you do dis rito
Are you extending the mystery gift event as well then?
ty rito

"**Pick up some new wards or** send a Mystery ward to one of your friends!"

And... they are not in the gifting centre either. Looks like Riot forgot about OCE.
Yeh, why are you agreeing with us but fighting us? I still can't purchase a mystery ward for friends or myself.

dw Smeag, there is no reason why he fights, he just does, that is the way of the nerd. the irony is, that NA servers can buy them for themselves but they cannot gift them as Blue Quaker suggests.
Perhaps he should take some five seconds to read NA and figure out that you can buy it for yourself? Or not, he can keep fighting for no reason.
Whatever bro, enjoy Bronze.
not true
When does it come out in the store? o.o (because it isn't there of now)..
that chat log tho XD
Still not available riot??  {{item:3070}}
I cant seem to find it in the store {{champion:32}} {{item:3070}}
still cant find it in store / gift WTF...
What's the fucking point of doing this when you can't even buy it...
where can u buy mystery ward skin ??? can't find them{{champion:150}}
Yay....
cant seem to see it in the gifting center
It'd be awesome if you could have multiple wards at the same time!
Do these contribute to the '6 mystery gifts and you get 1 mystery skin free' deal?
I want all ward skins
{{summoner:31}} Leave a comment
That moment when you are 50 rp from being able to get one :(
I promised my friend I would gift him a myst ward skin but now I cant T^T

Can we get some {{summoner:13}} on this? Because I don't have {{summoner:2}} . Its really {{summoner:3}} -ing the way you put these {{summoner:21}} -s on us rito. How will we {{summoner:7}} ? You service is not up to the {{summoner:32}}  here.
add them please riot i want to spend mah money and you just throw this in my face and dont even put it in....good one

its a waste who don't actually have like 5 ward skins...
and dats like 85% of everyone... 
and u know how we can insert items and stuff? - {{summoner:31}}  we should be able to do this with ward skins.
cant find them in stores rito why you do dis {{champion:32}} {{item:3070}}

God i love how riot creates this ward select during champ select{{item:2044}} . If only they could figure out how to make thing work before they release them{{summoner:11}}  (seriously, {{summoner:12}} boots and now this? what's happening over there riot?).
I bought rp today after school for this :'(
SOMEBODY HELP US PLS!!! No-one seems to know where the heck 2 GET a mystery ward.......
Seriously Riot, I'm contemplating an investment of between $50 - $100 towards these mystery ward and champ skins, but you aint makin it easy for me.....
Not really on sale.....
Yeh, how do I gift friends one? Can't seem to find anything in the store.
hey guys do u hav to gift to get those icons or can u get them from the store??? Oh and plz reply, thx :D
how could I purchase! nothing in the store...
